page.title: 02WHITTONSTALL PARISH CHURCH
page.content: { THE CHURCH OF SAINT PHILIP AND SAINT {JAMES}SERVES THE COMMUNITIES OF BOTH WHITTONSTALL AND NEWLANDS.AT PRESENT THERE IS NO RESIDENT VICAR AND THE OLD VICARAGE WAS SOLD AS A PRIVATE RESIDENCE SEVERAL YEARS AGO. CHURCH ATTTENDANCE HAS FALLEN OFF IN RECENT TIMES AND CONSEQUENTLY ONLY TWO SERVICES A MONTH ,HOLY COMMUNION AND EVENSONG,ARE HELD.BAPTISMS ,MARRIAGES ,AND BURIALS ARE ALSO HELD. THERE HAS BEEN A CHURCH OR CHAPEL ON THE SITE FOR AT LEAST 600YEARS AND IMPROVEMENTS UNDERTAKEN IN 1893 LEFT THE CHURCH VERY MUCH IN ITS PRESENT FORM. HIGHLIGHTS OF THE CHURCH'S YEAR ARE CHRISTMAS AND HARVEST WHEN THE SERVICE IS FOLLOWED BY A GRAND GET TO GETHER KNOWN AS THE "SUPPER".THE CHILDREN FROM THE SCHOOL ARE USUALLY INVOLVED IN THESE ACTIVITIES.
